name: ifx_error
purpose: Returns error code of last Informix call

return.description:
The Informix error codes (SQLSTATE & SQLCODE) formatted as
   x [SQLSTATE = aa bbb SQLCODE=cccc].where x = space : no errorE : errorN : no more dataW : warning? : undefinedIf the "x" character is anything other than space, SQLSTATE and
   SQLCODE describe the error in more detail.See the Informix manual for the description of SQLSTATE and
   SQLCODE
